tool_description: Create cartoon avatars for yourself and your friends
name: DoppelMe Avatars
title: DoppelMe Avatars

api_list.name: List Assets
api_list.description: Returns a list of assets available given a bodytype and assettype
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://doppelme-avatars.p.rapidapi.com/assets/1101/eye"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "doppelme-avatars.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://doppelme-avatars.p.rapidapi.com/assets/{bodytype_id}/{assettype}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "doppelme-avatars.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List Asset Types

api_list.name: List Body Types
api_list.description: Returns a list of avatar body types that are available to choose when creating your avatar
